overview: Juvenile Detention has never been so horny! Sex by buff men in uniform and hardcore teen action will get your heart pumping and jeans bursting the seams! Will Jamieson takes the lead once more for this debut DreamBoy from Simon Booth.
tagline: BorstalBoy shows us what goes on behind British prison bars. Whether the prisoners or the officers, one desire feeds them... that of fresh flesh!
title: BorstalBoy
